stories.title: Fully Managed RStudio on Amazon SageMaker for Data Scientists

stories.text:
Hello Hacker News,

I need some advice, recommendation, or referral. I’m US based, and I’m starting to do some paid product management consulting alongside my day job. In the past I’ve relied on a pretty basic setup with TurboTax, but I want to level up so that I can expense more things, like my home office, computer equipment, etc.

What do I do to make that happen? Anyone have any recommendations, or even an accountant that I can just send off reciepts to and they handle the rest?

Thanks!

(I did a search of Hacker News, I didn’t see this come up, so that’s why I ask)
stories.title: Ask HN: Accounting / Accountant for Consulting
